resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Sign up here!
"\n Welcome to Studio X Ottawa Inc."
"YOUR “one stop” eclectic dance, fitness and space rental Centre!\n"

"Studio X Ottawa is a unique hub of experienced local dance and fitness professionals " "comprise of the Studio’s team as well as independent instructors who rent the space to" "teach various classes.
" "We offer Latin Dance classes (like Salsa, Bachata) And Fitness classes " "(Zumba, Zumba Sentao, Zumba Toning, Strong by Zumba, Pound Fitness, etc.). " "And, our renters teach a variety of dance and fitness classes. 

" "We also rent the studios/rooms to teach or for practices, rehearsals, " "parties (baby shower, bridal shower, sweet sixteen, etc.), meetings, photoshoots, " "exhibitions, social gathering, etc. as well as Corporate events.

"
"\nWe have completed private classes and trainings with the following professional dancers and coaches:"

"– Adriano Ieropoli and Samantha Scali (Salsa On2 World Champions)
" "– Corinne Tardieu and Victor Alexis (Canadian Salsa, Bachata and Hustle Champions)
" "– David Zapeda and Paulina Posadas (6x World Salsa Champions)
" "– Anya Katsevman (World Salsa Champion and Judge)
" "– Katie Marlow (Director of World Salsa Summit, World Cabaret Exhibition Champion, Judge)
" "– Edson Vallon (Owner and director of SaltiMambo Dance School in Montreal Canada)
" "– Caroline Paré (Owner and director of Caroline Paré Danse Latine)
" "– Carla Voconii (Glam Mambo Company)
" "– Santo Rico

"

"
– 2019 Master Class (Salsa On2 – Mambo) with Eddie and Maria Torres 
" "– 2019 Master Class (Dominican Bachata) with Alex Morel at World Salsa Summit 
" "– 2018 Bachata Intensive with MG Latin Dance from Los Angeles 
" "– 2018 Master class with Adolfo in Montreal 
" "– 2018 Master class with Rodrigo Cortazar 
" "– 2018 Weekend training with Yvonne Gutierez in Montreal 
" "– 2017 Weekend training in Montreal with Eddie Torres and Yvonne Gutierez 
" "– 2016 Karel Flores Weekend Bootcamp Challenge in Montreal 
" "– 2013 Brazilian Zouk Training with K-Yo from Brazil 
" "– 2013 Cultural Weekend in New York (Spanish Harlem) with Eddy Torres, Maria Torres, Mambo D, Yvonne Gutierez, etc. 
" "– 2010 Styling weekend in Boston with Karel Flores, Ana Masacote, Burju, Julissa Cruz and Shani Talmor 
" "– 2009 and 2011 Masacote Retreat

"

"
World Mastery Certifications (Adolfo, Alex and Desiree, Anita, Korke and Judith), My Salsa Online, Salsa Bachata Online" "Fitness Certifications:
" "YMCA, Canfitpro, CPR, Zumba (Gold, Kids, Junior, Sentao, Toning, Strong), Zumbini, Pound" "Fitness, Piyo, YogaFit, Qidance, Insanity, Piloxing

"
